name: Sengoku Musou 2 with Moushouden & Empires HD Version
name_original: Sengoku Musou 2 with Moushouden & Empires HD Version
description:
Sengoku Musou 2 with Moushouden & Empires HD Version is an action game developed by Omega Force. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Koei Tecmo Games.
Sengoku Musou 2 with Moushouden & Empires HD Version is available on PlayStation 3 and PS Vita.
